channel.title: CVE Feed for Zoom Video Communications Inc -- Zoom Client for Meetings for Android
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Zoom Video Communications Inc -- Zoom Client for Meetings for Android

item.title: CVE-2021-34425|2024-08-04T00:12:50.165Z -- zoom%20video%20communications%20inc -- zoom%20client%20for%20meetings%20for%20android
item.description: The Zoom Client for Meetings before version 5.7.3 (for Android, iOS, Linux, macOS, and Windows) contain a server side request forgery vulnerability in the chat\'s "link preview" functionality. In versions prior to 5.7.3, if a user were to enable the chat\'s "link preview" feature, a malicious actor could trick the user into potentially sending arbitrary HTTP GET requests to URLs that the actor cannot reach directly.
